title: Evil Twin

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You and a good player start knowing each others roles. If the good player is killed by lynch or by a town killing, good instantly loses. Good cannot win while you both live.
- If they’re alignment changes to any evil, you get a new good twin.

desc:
Post 3666
*”I'm not Sara! I'm Clara! SHE is Sara! Sara is the evil one! Not me!"*
